headline.print_headline: Trump’s Empire: A Maze of Debts and Opaque Ties
headline.main: Trump’s Empire: A Maze of Debts and Opaque Ties

lead_paragraph: A review of the Republican presidential nominee’s holdings uncovered more debt than what is apparent on his federal election filing, and partnerships with even more liabilities.
snippet: A review of the Republican presidential nominee’s holdings uncovered more debt than what is apparent on his federal election filing, and partnerships with even more liabilities....
abstract: New York Times investigation reveals Donald J Trump's real estate ventures in United States have at least $650 million in debt, twice amount reflected in his public filings; inquiry also finds Trump's fortunes rely on array of financial backers, belying his image as wealthy man beholden to no one; much of Trump's business ventures remain cloaked in mystery, and he has declined to disclose his tax returns or allow an independent valuation of his assets.

byline.contributor: David W. Chen contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
